meanings.definition: Having handles or projections resembling a loop
meanings.sent1: The ansate design of the mug made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent2: The basket had an ansate shape that allowed for easy carrying.
meanings.sent3: The ansate pattern on the bag made it look like a fancy gift.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was ansate, radiating warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The ansate door handle welcomed visitors with its unique design.

meanings.definition: Shaped like a handle or loop
meanings.sent1: The ansate symbol on the map marked the location of the treasure.
meanings.sent2: The necklace had an ansate pendant that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The ansate clouds in the sky seemed to be waving at us.
meanings.sent4: His ansate haircut made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The ansate pattern on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Having or resembling a handle or loop
meanings.sent1: The ansate teapot was perfect for pouring tea without spilling.
meanings.sent2: The ansate branches of the tree provided a natural resting spot for birds.
meanings.sent3: The ansate belt buckle was a unique accessory for his outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her ansate earrings dangled gracefully as she moved.
meanings.sent5: The ansate design of the chair made it easy to move around the room.
